ul.li: Determining program correctness requires knowing what the program is supposed to do, i.e. a specification

Example:
In: natural number \(k\)
Out: a prime factor of \(k\)
Function specifications may allow more than one correct output for one input, but must have at least one output for each input.
Specifications in natural language are often ambiguous, therefore a formal specification is preferable
We can use standard predicate logic (quantifiers, conjunction, disjunction, implication, negation, predicates and functions, etc.)

note.div: Axiomatické modelování datových struktur: Pair \({\cal P}[{\cal T}]\) of elements of \(\cal T\)

Function symbols:
\(\mathrm{pair}: {\cal T}\times{\cal T}\to{\cal P}[{\cal T}]\)
\(\mathrm{fst}: {\cal P}[{\cal T}] \to {\cal T}\)
\(\mathrm{snd}: {\cal P}[{\cal T}] \to {\cal T}\)
Axioms:
\(\forall x, y . \mathrm{fst}(\mathrm{pair}(x, y)) = x\)
\(\forall x, y . \mathrm{snd}(\mathrm{pair}(x, y)) = y\)
\(\forall p . \mathrm{pair}(\mathrm{fst}(p), \mathrm{snd}(p)) = p\)
Axiomatické modelování datových struktur: List \({\cal L}[{\cal T}]\) of elements of \(\cal T\)

Function symbols:
\(\mathrm{cons}: {\cal T}\times{\cal L}[{\cal T}]\to{\cal L}[{\cal T}]\)
\(\mathrm{first}: {\cal L}[{\cal T}] \to {\cal T}\)
\(\mathrm{rest}: {\cal L}[{\cal T}] \to {\cal L}[{\cal T}]\)
\(\mathrm{empty}: {\cal L}[{\cal T}]\)
Axioms:
\(\forall l, x . \mathrm{first}(\mathrm{cons}(x, l)) = x\)
\(\forall l, x . \mathrm{rest}(\mathrm{cons}(x, l)) = l\)
\(\forall l . \neg [l = \mathrm{empty}] \implies \mathrm{cons}(\mathrm{first}(l), \mathrm{last}(l)) = l\)
\(\forall l, x . \neg [\mathrm{cons}(x, l) = \mathrm{empty}]\)
Axiomatické modelování datových struktur: Array \({\cal A}[{\cal T}]\) of elements of \(\cal T\)

Function symbols:
\(\cdot [\cdot]: {\cal A}[{\cal T}]\times{\cal N}\to{\cal T}\)
\(\mathrm{write}: {\cal A}[{\cal T}] \times {\cal N} \times {\cal T} \to {\cal A}[{\cal T}]\)
Axioms:
\(\forall a, v, i, j . [i = j] \implies [\mathrm{write}(a, i, v)[j] = v]\)
\(\forall a, v, i, j . \neg[i=j] \implies [\mathrm{write}(a, i, v)[j] = a[j]]\)
\(\forall a, b . [\forall i . a[i] = b[i]] \iff [a = b]\)
